QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: showTrafficIndicators
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Shows traffic indicators, including conflict radius and line guides

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: showWinchControlMenu
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Shows the winch control menu buttons and slider

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: horizontalConflictDistance
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: The horizontal distance to nearby traffic inside which the situation is considered a conflict, and traffic indicators turn red. Twice this distance is used for proximity detection, meaning that the indicators will turn yellow.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: verticalConflictDistance
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: The vertical distance to nearby traffic inside which the situation is considered a conflict, and traffic indicators turn red. Twice this distance is used for proximity detection, meaning that the indicators will turn yellow.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rssiWarning
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Local (drone) RSSI below this value will trigger a warning

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rssiAlert
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Local (drone) RSSI below this value will trigger an alert

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: missionToolsInsecureHttps
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Do not validate server certificate for mission tools HTTPS connection
